sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Bin86-&bin86-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout:
sh from the bash package
as from the binutils package ld from the binutils package strip from the binutils package
chmod from the fileutils package install from the fileutils package ln from the fileutils package mv from the fileutils package
cc from the gcc package
make from the make package
sed from the sed package
